sentence: The image is a screenshot of a retro-style website named "LogicGames.com," dedicated to logic and strategy games.
sentence_cn: 该图是“LogicGames.com”复古风格网站的截图，该网站致力于逻辑和策略游戏。

sentence: The site features a red header with welcoming text and navigation options such as "Free Logic Games," "Play All Games," "Games for Windows," and "Cool Jigsaw Games."
sentence_cn: 该网站的标题为红色，其中包含欢迎文字和导航选项，例如“免费逻辑游戏”、“玩所有游戏”、“适用于 Windows 的游戏”和“酷炫的拼图游戏”。

sentence: Underneath the header, there is a grid layout showcasing different online games, each with a small description and a "Play Game" link.
sentence_cn: 标题下方有一个网格布局，展示不同的在线游戏，每个游戏都有一个简短的描述和一个“玩游戏”链接。

sentence: 1. Crate Man I Jr. - A puzzle game about reaching a red crate in different rooms.
sentence_cn: 1. Crate Man I Jr.——一款关于在不同房间中找到红色板条箱的益智游戏。

sentence: 2. Crate Man II Jr. - Similar to the first, another crate-reaching puzzle.
sentence_cn: 2. Crate Man II Jr.——与第一个类似，也是另一个到达板条箱的谜题。

sentence: 3. Crate Man III Jr. - Continuation of the crate series.
sentence_cn: 3. Crate Man III Jr.——板条箱系列的延续。

sentence: 4. Tilox - Objective is to remove squares by jumping on them.
sentence_cn: 4. Tilox——目标是通过跳跃来移除方块。

sentence: 5. Peg Jump - Aim is to remove pieces by jumping.
sentence_cn: 5. Peg Jump - 目标是通过跳跃移除棋子。

sentence: 6. Ledix - A Sokoban-type game involving pushing boxes.
sentence_cn: 6. Ledix——一款涉及推箱子的推箱子类型的游戏。

sentence: 7. Tilogic - Challenge to flip blue tiles to yellow.
sentence_cn: 7. Tilogic——挑战将蓝色瓷砖翻转为黄色。

sentence: 8. Quarda - Rotate squares to make color rows.
sentence_cn: 8. Quarda——旋转正方形以形成彩色行。

sentence: 9. Cone Flip - Flip ice cream into cones.
sentence_cn: 9. 甜筒翻转——将冰淇淋翻转成甜筒。

sentence: The games have small, pixelated preview images.
sentence_cn: 游戏的预览图像很小而且像素化。

sentence: On the right side, there is a sidebar with an "ONLINE GAMES" banner, along with an advertisement featuring an armored character and the text "FEAR ME, MORTAL!" followed by "PLAY FREE."
sentence_cn: 右侧的侧边栏上有“在线游戏”横幅，还有一则广告，广告中有一个身穿盔甲的人物，旁边写着“害怕我，凡人！”，后面跟着“免费玩”。

sentence: The overall design has a retro, early 2000s aesthetic with bright colors.
sentence_cn: 整体设计具有复古、 21 世纪初期的美感并且色彩明亮。
